alb.util.menu

Interface Action

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddCategoryAction, AddContractBusiness, AddContractCategoryBusiness, AddMechanicAction, AddMechanicBusiness, BaseMenu, ClientesMenu, DeleteCategoryAction, DeleteContractBusiness, DeleteContractCategoryBusiness, DeleteForLastMonthPayrollAction, DeleteLastGenetaredPayrollsBusiness, DeleteLastPayrollByMechanicAction, DeleteLastPayrollForMechanicIdBusiness, DeleteMechanicAction, DeleteMechanicBusiness, FacturarReparacionesAction, FindAllContractCategoriesBusiness, FindAllPayrollsBusiness, FindContractByIdBusiness, FindContractByMechanicIdBusiness, FindContractCategoryByIdBussines, FindPayrollByIdBusiness, FindPayrollsByMechanicIdBusiness, FinishContractBusiness, GeneratePayrollAction, GeneratePayrolls, GestionCategoriasMenu, GestionNominasMenu, LiquidarFacturaAction, ListContractCategoryAction, ListContractCategoryBusiness, ListMechanicsAction, ListMechanicsActiveAction, ListPayrollAction, MainMenu, MainMenu, MainMenu, MainMenu, MecanicosMenu, ModificarAveriaAction, NotYetImplementedAction, RecepcionMenu, RegistrarAveriaAction, ReparacionesNoFacturadasUnClienteAction, RepuestosMenu, SettleInvoiceBusiness, TiposVehiculoMenu, UpdateCategoryAction, UpdateContractBusiness, UpdateContractCategoryBusiness, UpdateMechanicAction, UpdateMechanicBusiness, VehiculosMenu

    public interface Action
    Representa cada acción invocada por el usuario. Cada acción se encargará de la interacción con el usuario: pantalla, teclado, listados y validaciones; e invocará a la capa de servicios.
    Author:
    alb
